```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(rvest)

url <- "https://results.baa.org/2023/?page=1&event=R&event_main_group=runner&pid=search&pidp=start"
objs <- read_html(url)%>%
html_nodes("table")%>%
html_table()

write_csv(x = objs[[1]], file = "boston_marathon_2023")

# link brings you to the page. code works for other links but not this one

for(i in 2:100){
url <- paste0("https://results.baa.org/2023/?page=",i,"&event=R&event_main_group=runner&pid=search&pidp=start")
objs <- read_html(url)%>%
html_nodes("table")%>%
html_table()
x <- objs[[1]]
dataset<- bind_rows(dataset, x)

}
```
